price: und Mitgefühl von Uns aus und Lauterkeit. Er war gottesfürchtig
arabic: وَحَنَانٗا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَزَكَوٰةٗۖ وَكَانَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: waḥanānan min ladunnā wazakatan wakāna taqiyyan
